title: Bug 110566 - Wrong data set result returned when setting an invalid filter expression 'row[0]'
description: When the filter expression 'row[0] equals to 0' is set, the system either returns the wrong data set result or just returns a null result set.
OB: When the filter expression 'row[0] equals to 0' is set
EB: A relevant error message should pop up
SR:
1. Open the application
2. Set the filter expression 'row[0] equals to 0'
3. Observe the result set or any error message that appears
